CustomField.formula:
IF( CONTAINS(Vehicle.Name, 'Electa Model 3.1 - 2025'), IMAGE('/resource/EM4', 'Electa Model 3.1 - 2025', 70, 70), IF( CONTAINS(Vehicle.Name, 'Electra Model 4 - 2025'), IMAGE('/resource/ElectraModel', 'Electra Model 4 - 2025', 70, 70), IF( CONTAINS(Vehicle.Name, 'Electra Model 3'), IMAGE('/resource/ElectraModel3', 'Electra Model 3', 70, 70),
IMAGE('/resource/EM4', 'Electa Model 3.1 - 2025', 70, 70) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Vehicle Picture
